data.name: Akpala
data.description:
Experience a thrilling action game in VR space, offering unique multiplayer magic battles with three new features!

① Voice Recognition System: Your spells activate when you chant, and posing like an anime hero enhances your magic. Enjoy an incredibly realistic magic battle experience!

② Conversations with AI Characters: Interact with 3D AI characters in the tutorial stage. This voice-based communication offers a distinct experience from text-based chats.

③ 'e-act Catcher' Feature: 
This optional DLC allows you to be a video director, filming players in Akpala from your computer!
The VR game player will be like an actor in a virtual space or Vtuver.
Control various cameras from your PC, enabling video distribution that feels like movies or promotional videos. Explore this innovative broadcasting tool!

For more details on the PC version with 'e-act Catcher', please visit our official website!
E-act Chater is provided for free.

[Game System]
The game supports up to four players in multiplayer mode, featuring 2v2 team battles and battle royales.
Also, there are solo modes such as tutorials, and shooting range. 

In multiplayer mode, players can create blocks and place them on the stage. 
They can build their own advantageous positions for easier combat, or stack them high to snipe from above, enjoying battles with various strategies! 

On the battlefield, flex your brain, move your body, and loudly chant magic!
